subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The first night race in Formula One history put Singapore on the sport's map in 2008, and visitors to the 2010 Grand Prix this weekend will find that the city has not stopped innovating.
snippet: The first night race in Formula One history put Singapore on the sport's map in 2008, and visitors to the 2010 Grand Prix this weekend will find that the city has not stopped innovating.
